def_en: To jump-start a vehicle which has a flat battery means to make the engine start by getting power from the battery of another vehicle, using special cables called jump leads.

def_cn: 推动（已停顿的系统或进程）；使重新快速运转
def_en: To jump-start a system or process that has stopped working or progressing means to do something that will make it start working quickly or effectively.
